channel.title: Azzero V0.3
channel.description:
Started this a few nights ago, not a whole lot on it yet and it still needs a lot of work. :)
[hr]
[b]- V0.3 -[/b]
Added a pause menu and game options + controls for sound effect volume, music volume, and the brightness level. Some small bug fixes as well.
Picture of the game options:
[img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/4716/options2.png[/img]
[hr]
[b]- V0.2 -[/b]
Basic game functions finished, video: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=P_-8UxXs5ho
[hr]
Yes, I know the music's kinda annoying. I kinda like it, though I did make it so... Mute the video if you don't like it.
Also, don't hate please. I just started really messing with java a few days ago when I started this. ^_^;

item.title: Azzero V0.3
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:15, topic:411632”]This is rather nice, but maybe slow down the gameplay a little and on further levels speed it up?

That is if you are considering adding more levels. :P[/quote]

I am.

Read full topic

item.title: Azzero V0.3
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

Budda:

Or just go the normal way of games like this, and make it so you have to shoot the larger asteroids a few times for them to be destroyed/ split them into a few smaller ones.

I could, but that doesn’t seem as unique.

Maybe if I combine the two ideas? Make it so it takes a few shots to break the big ones, but when you get your ship upgraded it can take them down easier?

Read full topic

item.title: Azzero V0.3
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Upgrading your ship will allow you to shoot down the bigger asteroids quicker?

Also… why not have some asteroids come in at angles? \ | /

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Budda Budda
item.description:
@Budda wrote:

Or just go the normal way of games like this, and make it so you have to shoot the larger asteroids a few times for them to be destroyed/ split them into a few smaller ones.

item.title: Azzero V0.3
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

IlikeArrays:

Make the game vertical instead of horizontal? Maybe make larger asteroids you can’t destroy or something to make the game a little harder? Looks easy (from the video anyways)

Well it doesn’t have much work in it yet, but those are some good ideas. I like the larger asteroid idea, but maybe they could be destroyable in later levels after getting power-ups and stuff?

EDIT: Haven’t been working on it much recently. Been working on some website stuff (a website to put Azzero on and a site for a friend).

Read full topic

item.description:

Racist Turtle:

Is it the video recording software that’s making it look like it’s running very low FPS?

Yeah.

EDIT: Well the video doesn’t even seem laggy to me… It might just be the way the background’s moving that’s giving you that impression?

item.title: Azzero V0.3
item.dc:creator: @Kono-chan Kono-chan
item.description:
@Kono-chan wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:4, topic:411632”][quote author=Kono-chan link=topic=512887.msg3722547#msg3722547 date=1314045404]

I can make you better nes-style music if you like.

The music was mainly to get a simple feel for FamiTracker, though my friend is probly going to be making music for our little games from now on.

Thanks for the offer though.
[/quote]I find that those authentic trackers are quite complicated and hard to use. I just synthesize the sound in FL Studio.

Anyways, if you change your mind, check my thread out: http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,512626.0.html

Got some basic tune samples composed there, both NES-style and more modern.[/quote]

Yeah it’s going to take awhile for him to get used to it, though he opted to be the music guy… So, eh. Sucks for him I guess. xD It’s not all that difficult once you get the hang of it, the hard part is actually thinking of a song to make.

And thanks, I’ll check 'em out.

Read full topic

item.title: Azzero V0.3
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Kono-chan, post:3, topic:411632”][quote author=Speljohan link=topic=512887.msg3722546#msg3722546 date=1314045329]
I can make you better nes-style music if you like.
[/quote]

The music was mainly to get a simple feel for FamiTracker, though my friend is probly going to be making music for our little games from now on.

Thanks for the offer though. :)[/quote]I find that those authentic trackers are quite complicated and hard to use. I just synthesize the sound in FL Studio.

Anyways, if you change your mind, check my thread out: http://gamedev.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,512626.0.html

Got some basic tune samples composed there, both NES-style and more modern.

Read full topic
